mapper.select: SELECT article_no, article_title, article_create_dt, user_no, hit_count FROM tb_article where article_index_no = '4' and (article_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or article_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) order by article_no desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}

select article_no , article_title , article_content , article_create_dt , hit_count , category , sex , baseball , (SELECT article_no FROM tb_article where article_index_no = '4' and article_no < #{article_no} ORDER BY article_no DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_article_no , (SELECT article_title FROM tb_article where article_index_no = '4' and article_no < #{article_no} ORDER BY article_no DESC LIMIT 1) AS prev_title , (SELECT article_no FROM tb_article WHERE article_index_no = '4' and article_no > #{article_no} ORDER BY article_no ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_article_no , (SELECT article_title FROM tb_article WHERE article_index_no = '4' and article_no > #{article_no} ORDER BY article_no ASC LIMIT 1) AS next_title from tb_article where article_index_no = '4' and article_no = #{article_no}
select count(*) from tb_article where article_index_no = '4' and (article_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or article_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article (article_index_no, article_content, article_title, article_create_dt, user_no, baseball, category, sex) VALUES('4', #{article_content}, #{article_title}, now(), #{user_no}, #{baseball}, #{category}, #{sex})

INSERT INTO tb_file (article_no, file_name, file_path, file_ext, file_size, file_reg_date, file_re_name) VALUES(#{article_no}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_ext}, #{file_size}, now(), #{file_re_name})
mapper.select: select max(article_no) from tb_article where article_index_no = '4'
SELECT file_no , file_name , file_path , file_ext , file_size , file_reg_date , file_re_name FROM tb_file where article_no = #{article_no}
SELECT file_no , file_name , file_path , file_ext , file_size , file_reg_date , file_re_name FROM tb_file where file_no = #{file_no}
